publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3835 Angela Constance: Crufts Win for Broxburn Bandits—That the Parliament congratulates the Broxburn Bandits on their recent win at the Crufts flyball relay event in Birmingham; applauds the Broxburn Bandits for being the first team from Scotland to take a major title at this world-renowned dog show, and wishes the Broxburn Bandits continued success at future competitions. Supported by: Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, Michael Matheson*, Bob Doris*, Aileen Campbell*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-3835 Crufts Win for Broxburn Bandits (lodged on 30 March 2009) Bill Kidd*

S3M-3835 Angela Constance: Crufts Win for Broxburn Bandits—That the Parliament congratulates the Broxburn Bandits on its recent win at the Crufts flyball relay event in Birmingham; applauds the Broxburn Bandits for being the first team from Scotland to take a major title at this world-renowned dog show, and wishes the Broxburn Bandits continued success at future competitions. Supported by: Sandra White, Jamie McGrigor, Michael Matheson, Bob Doris, Aileen Campbell, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bill Kidd
S3M-3835 Crufts Win for Broxburn Bandits (lodged on 30 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
